com.github.vbauer.herald.annotation

Annotation Type Log


  • @Documented
 @Target(value={FIELD,TYPE})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Log
    Log annotation must be used on logger fields to automatically inject logger instance. It is also possible to put this annotation on class to inject loggers in all suitable fields.
    Author:
    Vladislav Bauer

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean required
      Check if logger object must be instantiated or not.
      String value
      Setup logger name, if it's empty, then class name will be used.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Setup logger name, if it's empty, then class name will be used.
        Returns:
        logger name
        Default:
        ""

      • required

        public abstract boolean required
        Check if logger object must be instantiated or not.
        Returns:
        mandatory
        Default:
        true
